name: GoodSmileInfo
author: Injabie3#1660
short: Post news from Good Smile Company's (GSC) website to a channel
description: This cog checks GSC for news every hour and posts it to a configurable channel.
install_msg: Thanks for installing the GoodSmileInfo cog. Run [p]goodsmileinfo to configure.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store user-specific settings.
